synopsis.text:
He aded by Tokimune Susumu, the Independent 8th unit of the Arandas military finds itself on the ever-shifting battlefield of a relentless war against the neighboring nation of Ingelmia. With a personal vendetta driving him to uncover the truth behind his sister's death in service, Susumu seizes the opportunity to commandeer the experimental Argevollen mech when a civilian convoy comes under attack. Little does he know, activating the Argevollen binds it to his mind, making him the sole pilot capable of controlling it.

As the Great Wall fortress slowly opens, the tide of war begins to shift, and Susumu's first battle approaches. In the heat of combat, he crosses paths with Jamie Hazaford, an enigmatic engineer whose motives for being involved in the conflict are as complex as his own. This fateful encounter forever alters the destiny of the Independent 8th unit and the trajectory of the war itself.

In a world where fighting has become the norm, Tokimune Susumu and his newfound ally, Jamie, must navigate the treacherous landscape of war, deception, and personal loss, all while piloting the formidable Argevollen in their struggle for survival and the pursuit of truth.
